description:
On his way to dance practice, Hibiki runs into a young prince... who looks exactly like him! The two decide to switch places for a day, but when it`s time to switch back, they`re interrupted by Mink and Tank looking for a dance stone.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Dancing Prince Looks Just Like Me?!
踊る王子はそっくりさん!?
